d.f: `一~`種~`由~`兩~`個人~`合作~`表演~`的~`曲藝~，`一人~`在~`前面~`做~`動作~，`另~`一人~`藏~`在~`後面~`配合~`前面~`動作~`說唱~，`造成~`動作~`和~`說唱~`均~`出~`自~`前面~`一人~`的~`效果~。
`比喻~`一人~`出面~，`一人~`在~`背後~`操縱~，`互相~`串通~`的~`手法~。

English: a form or theatrical double act, popular since Qing times, with one player seated stage front and acting out the poem or song of the second player hidden at the back (also written `雙~黄|双黄)
double reed (as used in oboe or bassoon)
